name: Taco Soup
ingredients: 2 cans stewed diced tomatoes Taco Seasoning to taste or 1/2 pkg.
1 can corn 1 pkg. dry ranch seasoning
2 cans kidney beans or black, white, pinto 4 oz. diced green chiles.
steps: Brown beef and onion, drain grease
Serve with shredded cheddar cheese, sour cream, and tortilla chips.
